resource-agent.name: HealthCPU
resource-agent.longdesc: Systhem health agent that measures the CPU idling and updates the #health-cpu attribute.

parameter.name: state
parameter.longdesc: Location to store the resource state in.

parameter.name: yellow_limit
parameter.longdesc: Lower (!) limit of idle percentage to switch the health attribute to yellow. I.e. the #health-cpu will go yellow if the %idle of the CPU falls below 50%.
parameter.shortdesc: Lower limit for yellow health attribute

parameter.name: red_limit
parameter.longdesc: Lower (!) limit of idle percentage to switch the health attribute to red. I.e. the #health-cpu will go red if the %idle of the CPU falls below 10%.
parameter.shortdesc: Lower limit for red health attribute
